column1: Do Tell me why do you come to see me today Family Won Lost my temper What sorts of things make you lose your temple Wom Lots of things The kidds I get on my nerves When does that ape Langella Television too loud And take shawn for instance he spilled sugar all over the counter last night when my husband was out Ahhh Then what happened I lost my tempers Pushed him down Not hard he wasn t hurt just Cried a little Maybe er Maybe what
